subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Unable to earn her tour card through sponsor exemptions, Michelle Wie has entered the L.P.G.A. Tour qualifying school. The first stage will be at Mission Hills in Rancho Mirage, Calif., site of the Kraft Nabisco Championship, where Wie played in the final group of the L.P.G.A.’s first major when she was in the eighth grade.
